title._content: Post Office construction on West Street

description._content: TITLE Post Office construction on West Street CREATOR Keene Camera Club SUBJECT Buildings - NH - Keene Post offices - NH - Keene Building construction - NH - Keene DESCRIPTION Photograph of the Post Office in Keene New Hampshire, located on West Street. The government purchased the General Griffin property in 1907 and the building was erected in 1911. The old William Lamson house, built in 1804, was razed for the project, which required extensive driving of piles to establish a firm foundation. The building is now the John Day Educational Building, used by SAU 29. PUBLISHER Keene Public Library DATE DIGITAL 20080509 DATE ORIGINAL 1911 RESOURCE TYPE photographs FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER hsykkpc042 RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known restriction on publication.
